title: Stuffed Eggs
introduction: Stuffed eggs, or Uova Ripiene, bring a delicious, savory touch to any meal. Prepared with a classic blend of anchovies, capers, parsley, and creamy mayonnaise, these stuffed eggs boast a rich flavor profile. Perfect as an appetizer, these tasty morsels are sure to impress your guests and become a family favorite.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: 1. Place the eggs in a medium saucepan with cold water to cover. Cover the pan and bring the water to a simmer. Cook 12 minutes. Drain and cool the eggs under running water.
2. Line a plate with lettuce leaves. Peel the eggs and cut them in half lengthwise. Scoop out the yolks and place them in a bowl. Arrange the egg white halves on the bed of lettuce.
3. In a medium bowl, mash the egg yolks with the anchovies, capers, parsley, mayonnaise, and olive oil until blended. Add salt and pepper to taste.
4. Spoon the yolk mixture into the whites. Garnish with parsley leaves. Serve immediately.
